symptoms.name: Gradually increasing, white colored, foul smelling vaginal discharge
symptoms.pattern: Chronic, lasting two months in one case

symptoms.name: Postcoital bleeding
symptoms.pattern: Chronic, lasting 3 months in one case, 1 year in another

symptoms.name: Lower abdominal pain
symptoms.pattern: Chronic, lasting 3 months in one case

physical_findings: Grossly erythematous, congested cervix bleeding on touch
Grade II/IV uterovaginal prolapse with cystocoele
Normal sized retroverted uterus, freely mobile
No adnexal mass or forniceal tenderness
Large irregular friable growth on cervix bleeding on touch
Cervix replaced by a large irregular and friable growth which bled on touch

lab_values.ESR: Raised (35 mm fall in first hour)

imaging_findings.Chest radiograph: Normal in some cases, scarring with bronchiectatic changes in both lung apices in one case
imaging_findings.CT scan of abdomen: Multiple peritoneal nodules in one case
imaging_findings.MRI pelvis: 3.4-cm cervical tumor with possible parametrial invasion in one case

required: Histological examination of cervical biopsy showing caseating granulomas
supportive: Acid-fast bacilli on microscopy (though not always present)
Culture of Mycobacterium tuberculosis (gold standard, but often negative)
